note.p: Education: All Souls College, Oxford. BA (1799), MA (1805)

Career: Worked for the British Museum, London (1805); Keeper of Printed Books, British Museum (1812); worked on the catalogue (for 25 years); Rector of Stretham, Cambridgeshire (1827); retired from the British Museum to his rectory (1837)
Notes: Boase wrongly gives 1868 as year of death. 'W London' is William Howley, Bishop of London
